scripts.start: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_BUILD_DATE=$(date) react-scripts start
scripts.build: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_BUILD_DATE=$(date) react-scripts build
